backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom backend with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls. Includes functions for CRUD operations on chatrooms and messages, user presence tracking, and a password-protected delete function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removing an unwanted border from MessageInput and restoring a character counter, both targeting the MessageInput component with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing component functionality, UI patterns, query hooks, routing setup, and styling configurations across the React application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and a versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search with debounced queries, or removal, with request tracking to prevent stale results.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list filtering out Creator messages without media, auto-scroll on new messages, reply context, and message highlighting on scroll-to navigation.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating a new chatroom with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image, YouTube/Twitch video, or Twitter post). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter post previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby button for chatroom views. Includes character limit progress indicator for username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication is not used in this anonymous app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter), voice message playback, pin/unpin functionality, and reply threading. Supports emoji reactions and highlights referenced messages.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, media attachment support (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, Twitter posts), voice recording with timer, and character limit tracking. Validates URLs and file types before submission.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button, positioned at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes. Returns the debounced value.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient. Manages identity state, login status, and persists authentication across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including chatroom CRUD, messages, reactions, user profiles, and voice messages. Manages query keys, caching strategies, optimistic updates, and localStorage for user identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for the Giphy API integration including the API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation (k, M, B) for display, handling both number and bigint types.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images while preserving quality and orientation, with progress callbacks and fallback to original on failure.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that loads and displays a specific chatroom using route params, handles view count incrementing, and shows loading/error states before rendering the ChatArea component.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a list of chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, includes a create chatroom dialog, and handles navigation to individual chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking two known issues: an unwanted border on top of the chat input area and a missing character counter in the MessageInput component, both marked as fix requests.
